page.title: 09GOOD & BAD OF CHRISTCHURCH
page.content: THE BEST THING ABOUT LIVING IN CHRISTCHURCH IS THE BEAUTY OF DRUITT GARDENS, NAMED AFTER MR DRUITT. THERE IS A PATH GOING ALONG ONE SIDE OF THE GARDENS WHICH IS A COBBLED FOOTPATH. THERE ARE ALL SORTS OF BEAUTIFUL TREES, SOME OF WHICH BLOSSOM. EVERYONE LIKES THIS CHARMING PLACE WITH ITS LOVELY WILDLIFE. I THINK THE UGLIEST THINGS ARE THE DIRTY NOISE OF THE CARS AS THEY GO WHIZZING BY, THE DULL BUILDINGS AND THE WORKMEN DIGGING UP THE ROAD, DOING THE SEWAGE. I DON'T LIKE THE WAY THEY HAVE MADE THE ROUNDABOUT LONGER BUT AT LEAST IT HAS SHRUBS AND PLANTS GROWING ON IT.
